onboarding.title: Start Cooking
onboarding.body:
Let’s join our community
to cook better food!

shared.invalid_email: The email address is not valid. Please enter a valid email.
shared.unknown_error: An unknown error occurred. Please try again later.
shared.user_not_found: No user found with this email address.
shared.invalid_recipient_email: The email address is not valid.
shared.too_many_requests: Too many requests, please try again later.
shared.network_request_failed: Network error, please check your connection.

log_in.wrong_password: The password is incorrect. Please try again.
log_in.user_disabled: This user account has been disabled. Please contact support.

sign_up.email_already_in_use: The email is already in use by another account.
sign_up.operation_not_allowed: Email/password sign-in is not enabled. Please contact support.
sign_up.weak_password: The password is too weak. Please choose a stronger password.

forget_password.enter_email_recover_password: Enter your email to recover your password
